trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipientCollection class represents a set of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects.
CmsRecipientCollection implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The CmsRecipientCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class.
The CmsRecipientCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class and adds the specified recipient.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class that represents the specified CMS/PKCS #7 recipient.

The CmsRecipientCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class and adds recipients based on the specified subject identifier and set of certificates that identify the recipients.
A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of subject identifier.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that contains the certificates that identify the recipients.
The Add method adds a recipient to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the recipient to add to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
If the method succeeds, the method returns an <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the zero-based position where the recipient is to be inserted.
If the method fails, it throws an exception.
recipient is .
The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection to an array.
An <xref:System.Array> object to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index in `array` where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
- array is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
- -or- - array does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
array is .
index is outside the range of elements in array.
The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> array.

An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.

The zero-based index for the array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects in `array` to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
- array is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
- -or- - array does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
array is .
index is outside the range of elements in array.
The Count property retrieves the number of items in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of items in the collection.

The GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
The IsSynchronized property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
The Item property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the index in the collection.
The index is zero based.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object at the specified index.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
The Remove method removes a recipient from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the recipient to remove from the collection.
recipient is .
The SyncRoot property retrieves an <xref:System.Object> object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
An <xref:System.Object> object that is used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

The IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
